name: Mocha Ice Cappuccino
description: A rich and creamy coffee with chocolate and ice, perfect for a cold day.

name: Espresso
description: A concentrated coffee made by forcing a small amount of nearly boiling water through finely-ground coffee beans.

name: Latte
description: A smooth and creamy coffee made with espresso and steamed milk.

name: Cappuccino
description: An espresso-based coffee with steamed milk and a layer of frothy milk foam.

name: Americano
description: Espresso diluted with hot water for a smoother taste, similar to a regular drip coffee.

name: Flat White
description: A coffee made with espresso and steamed milk, creating a velvety, rich flavor with a balanced ratio of coffee to milk.
